com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.resources
Interface ResourcesInjector

All Known Implementing Classes:
DebugResourcesInjector, ProdResourcesInjector
public interface ResourcesInjector

DOM injector for Rhizosphere resources (javascript and styles). Resource injection might be tricky

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Summary
 void injectDependenciesCss()
          Injects the styles required by Rhizosphere dependencies (like jQuery UI) into the GWT host page.
 void injectDependenciesJavascript(java.lang.Runnable callback, boolean useGoogleCDN)
          Injects the javascript libraries Rhizosphere depends upon into the GWT host page.
 void injectRhizoCss()
          Injects the styles required by Rhizosphere into the GWT host page.
 void injectRhizoJavascript(java.lang.Runnable callback)
          Inject the Rhizosphere javascript libraries into the GWT host page.
 

Method Detail

injectDependenciesCss

void injectDependenciesCss()
Injects the styles required by Rhizosphere dependencies (like jQuery UI) into the GWT host page.

injectRhizoCss

void injectRhizoCss()
Injects the styles required by Rhizosphere into the GWT host page.

injectDependenciesJavascript

void injectDependenciesJavascript(java.lang.Runnable callback,
                                  boolean useGoogleCDN)
Injects the javascript libraries Rhizosphere depends upon into the GWT host page.

Parameters:
callback - A callback invoked after all the dependencies have been successfully injected and parsed by the browser.
useGoogleCDN - Whether to load dependencies from Google CDN (http://code.google.com/apis/libraries/) rather than from the local GWT deployment.

injectRhizoJavascript

void injectRhizoJavascript(java.lang.Runnable callback)
Inject the Rhizosphere javascript libraries into the GWT host page.

Parameters:
callback - A callback invoked after all the libraries have been successfully injected and parsed by the browser.
